title: Cover, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk, metallic
Technique: Foundation: plain weave, possibly handwoven. Stitches using silk: running, double running, surface satin. Satin stitch using metallic. Withdrawn element work with needle fillings. Sides finished by buttonhole stitc
description: Long rectangular cover  embroidered with a diagonal leaf and floral pattern in the field and a floral outer border using rust silk and metallic.  The field pattern incorporates "LIBERTA"  and "OCARAE."  Surface satin stitch at both ends simulate fringe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover, early 20th century. Medium: linen, silk, metallic
Technique: Foundation: plain weave, possibly handwoven. Stitches using silk: running, double running, surface satin. Satin stitch using metallic. Withdrawn element work with needle fillings. Sides finished by buttonhole stitc. 1979-66-3.
